title: Democracy Women's Petite Ab Solution Ankle Skimmer
description: "Ab"solution Technology offers an elastic waist band and mesh panels to "mold and hold"
Pockets a strategically placed for a figure flattering shape and a sweetheart back yoke to "boost your assets"
Our favorite style and now eco-friendly! Made with repreve fabric

Founded on the principle of "Curve Equality", which acknowledges that all shapes are different, but created equal, we designed a jean that enhances a woman's shape by fusing together style, comfort, and technology. Democracy's signature "Ab"solution jean uses innovative construction that incorporates smooth, super-stretch denim, slimming panels to mold and hold, a hidden inner elastic waistband for a no gap waist, mesh panels for tummy control, signature curved back yoke, and strategically placed pockets which give you a "booty lift".
